ITEMS.TITLE: Montevideo COMM
CONTENT: As a software developer at Montevideo COMM, I have played an essential role in the creation and maintenance of technological solutions. I have primarily focused on front-end development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, complemented with the use of GeneXus for the back-end.

Throughout my career, I have contributed to major projects, such as the prestigious news portal Montevideo Portal. Additionally, I have collaborated in creating custom applications for prominent clients, meeting their specific requirements with tailored solutions.

One of my most notable contributions to the news portal was the integration of artificial intelligence to optimize the work of journalists, especially in headline generation. We designed an AI-based title suggestion system that significantly streamlined the headline creation process by generating proposals in line with the content of the news.

ITEMS.TITLE: University | Self projects
CONTENT: During my time at UDELAR, I have been immersed in the Computer Engineering program, where I have acquired a solid foundation of knowledge in technology and web development.

However, my learning didn't stop in the classrooms. I have dedicated time outside of the curriculum to delve into web application development, exploring various technologies both in the front-end and back-end. This personal initiative has allowed me to expand my skills beyond what is taught in class and develop a comprehensive understanding of web programming.
Through personal projects and self-directed experimentation, I have strengthened my ability to tackle technical challenges and find innovative solutions.
